ValidationRule.description: Restrict Contract Signed With Close Date In The Past
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( StageName , 'Contract Signed'), CloseDate < TODAY(), NOT(CONTAINS($Profile.Name ,"Admin")), NOT($Profile.Name = "Management GB"), NOT($Profile.Name = "Management"), NOT($Profile.Name = "Management RM"), NOT($Profile.Name = "Management FR"), OR( YEAR(CloseDate) <> YEAR(TODAY()), MONTH(CloseDate)<> MONTH(TODAY()) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Close Date must be in current month and year when moving opportunity to Closed Won / Contract Signed
